get_zwave_parameter.description: Requests a Z-Wave Device parameter via the ISY. The parameter value will be returned as an entity extra state attribute with the name "ZW_#" where "#" is the parameter number.

parameter.description: The parameter number to retrieve from the device.
parameter.name: Parameter

get_zwave_parameter.name: Get Z-Wave Parameter

name.description: The new name to use within the ISY.
name.name: New Name

send_node_command.description: Sends a command to an ISY Device using its Home Assistant entity ID. Valid commands are: beep, brighten, dim, disable, enable, fade_down, fade_stop, fade_up, fast_off, fast_on, and query.

command.description: The command to be sent to the device.
command.name: Command

send_node_command.name: Send node command

send_program_command.description: Sends a command to control an ISY program or folder. Valid commands are run, run_then, run_else, stop, enable, disable, enable_run_at_startup, and disable_run_at_startup.

address.description: The address of the program to control (use either address or name).
address.name: Address

command.description: The ISY Program Command to be sent.
command.name: Command

isy.description: If you have more than one ISY connected, provide the name of the ISY to query (as shown on the Device Registry or as the top-first node in the ISY Admin Console).  If you have the same program name or address on multiple ISYs, omitting this will run the command on them all.
isy.name: ISY

name.description: The name of the program to control (use either address or name).

send_program_command.name: Send program command

command.description: The ISY REST Command to be sent to the device.
command.name: Command

parameters.description: A dict of parameters to be sent in the query string (e.g. for controlling coloured bulbs).
parameters.name: Parameters

unit_of_measurement.description: The ISY Unit of Measurement (UOM) to send with the command, if required.
unit_of_measurement.name: Unit of measurement

value.description: The integer value to be sent with the command.
value.name: Value

set_zwave_lock_user_code.description: Sets a Z-Wave Lock User Code via the ISY.

code.description: The code to set for the user.
code.name: Code

user_num.description: The user slot number on the lock.
user_num.name: User Number

set_zwave_lock_user_code.name: Set Z-Wave Lock User Code

set_zwave_parameter.description: Updates a Z-Wave Device parameter via the ISY. The parameter value will also be returned as a entity extra state attribute with the name "ZW_#" where "#" is the parameter number.

parameter.description: The parameter number to set on the end device.
parameter.name: Parameter

size.description: The size of the parameter, either 1, 2, or 4 bytes.
size.name: Size

value.description: The value to set for the parameter. May be an integer or byte string (e.g. "0xFFFF").
value.name: Value

set_zwave_parameter.name: Set Z-Wave Parameter
